#summary ThreadSanitizer build bot

= Buildbot location=
We have a [http://build.chromium.org/p/client.tsan/waterfall continuous build of ThreadSanitizer] where the fresh binaries are built regularly.<br/>
Please make sure the bots are green for the given revision when downloading a TSan binary. 

==Downloading TSan binaries for Linux, Mac==

You may download the latest ThreadSanitizer binaries at
http://build.chromium.org/p/client.tsan/waterfall.<br>
For example, for x86_64 Linux you will need  [http://build.chromium.org/p/client.tsan/binaries/tsan-r3340-amd64-linux-self-contained.sh]

To get it do:
{{{
wget http://build.chromium.org/p/client.tsan/binaries/tsan-r3340-amd64-linux-self-contained.sh
chmod +x tsan-r3340-amd64-linux-self-contained.sh
}}}

==Downloading TSan binaries for Windows==
For Windows, also go to http://build.chromium.org/p/client.tsan/binaries and grab the self-extracting archive called *tsan-r3340-x86-windows-sfx.exe*<br>
For example, [http://build.chromium.org/p/client.tsan/binaries/tsan-r1951-x86-windows-sfx.exe <BR>
Also see ThreadSanitizerForWindows
